Upcoming Events

To receive updates, email iaarngcyp@gmail.com with the subject “Subscribe to Events,” or use the subscribe form on our homepage.

Online Adventure Kits

Quarterly self-paced activity kits focused on STEM, health, and life skills. Sign-up today.

Summer Camp

A week-long camp experience that builds confidence and lasting connections.

Month of the Military Child (MOMC)

In April, we celebrate military children across Iowa. Request classroom celebration kits and join “Purple Up!” activities.

Military Family Events

Regional gatherings that build life skills and community — including the Fall Family Festival and Military Family Ball.

Yellow Ribbon

Programs that support youth throughout the deployment cycle by connecting them with peers facing similar challenges.

About

Fostering community, resilience, and positive development among Iowa’s military-connected children and families.
